title: ITV Tour de France 2014 Stage 1 Highlights PDTV x264 AAC
description:
ITV Tour de France 2014 Stage 1 Highlights PDTV x264 AAC

Saturday 5th July 2014 ITV4
7pm to 8pm Highlights

Highlights from stage one as Yorkshire plays host to the start of this year's Tour de France with a 191km stage from Leeds to Harrogate, taking in the fantastic scenery of the Yorkshire Dales. The riders tackle three climbs en-route, including Buttertubs Pass. The last 60km is flat though, and the winner - and the Tour's first yellow jersey wearer - will almost certainly be a sprinter. After missing out on stage one last year, Mark Cavendish will have extra motivation to be first across the line in Harrogate. Presented by Gary Imlach, with guest Chris Boardman, commentary by Phil Liggett and Paul Sherwen, and reporter Ned Boulting.
